title: Gyazo Picture: Client Made Me Dodge because it froze like this

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I duo queue'd with a friend and the client froze after I accepted I could hear all the sounds and it resulted in me getting an LP penalty as well as the timer penalty for dodging because i was unable to ban or pick a champ. Plenty of bugs occur when the client has been open too long. Is there any fix other than restarting client.

replies.body: It's probably a good idea to close out your client while you aren't playing to make sure your pc isn't getting bogged down from having to run unneeded programs for a prolonged amount of time. With that being said, you should definitely take a step back and try to troubleshoot that freezing before hopping back into the queues. Try refreshing your client first, and if you're still having random freezes try running a quick repair through the client options.
It happened again on a fresh client about 10 minutes ago, both times I was on another account "ProfileName" an account currently Gold II.
This account, and thank you for the quick response!
